### Exploratory plots for simulations

#### N=1000
Histogram of outbreak sizes 
intervention parameters: 
  - v=0.05
  - qs = 0
  - qspep = 0.04
  - qi=0.2 
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(outsizes.1000, aes(x=size, fill=vax)) +
  geom_histogram(alpha=0.5, position = "identity", binwidth = 1) +
  labs(x="Outbreak size", y = "Count") +
  theme_minimal() +
  guides(fill=guide_legend(title="Vaccination rate"))
```

No intervetions 
```{r}
ggplot(outsizes.1000.noint, aes(x=size, fill=vax)) +
  geom_histogram(alpha=0.5, position = "identity", binwidth = 1) +
  labs(x="Outbreak size", y = "Count") +
  theme_minimal() +
  guides(fill=guide_legend(title="Vaccination rate"))
```
